messages.subject: Re: OT:- How do I separate two jammed bowls? Success!
messages.msgSnippet: My grateful thanks to everyone who replied to my SOS about the jammed bowls. I tried almost all of the suggestions - several of them simultaneously!
messages.messageBody:
My grateful thanks to everyone who replied to my SOS about the jammed bowls.

I tried almost all of the suggestions - several of them simultaneously!
Eventually, there was a somewhat ominous cracking, and - lo and behold - the
dishes squelched apart. And even lower and beholder, the ominous cracking
sound was apparently quite unrelated related to the fabric of the bowls!
Chalk up a resounding success. :-)

Thank you all again, very much!
Mattie
